name: .CCCTASK File Extension
summary: Learn about .CCCTASK files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open CCCTASK files in Carbon Copy Cloner (Mac). To import a CCCTASK file into Carbon Copy Cloner, double-click the file. Carbon Copy Cloner will then walk you through importing the task.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ccctask file in Bombich Software Carbon Copy Cloner
images.caption: CCCTASK file open in Bombich Software Carbon Copy Cloner
